skillTree.localised_description: For years the grisly murders that haunted the dockyards of Marienburg were ascribed to a figure nicknamed the Suiddock Beast. Mundvard's Pet terrorgheist.

effects.description: Mount: Beast of Suiddock

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

skillTree.localised_description: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 when attacking
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: For centuries Mundvard has ruled the underworld of the Wasteland. Calculating, plotting and consolidating immense power and wealth.

effects.description:
Growth: +20
	(local province)

Control: -5
	(local enemy province)
Passive ability: "The Hunger"

skillTree.localised_description: Mundvard moves softly, fights slippery and treads elusive. Still the veins running through his wing are coursing with dark magic, making it harder than the thickest stone.

effects.description: Ward save: 5%
Armour: +10

skillTree.localised_description: If the great merchant families that hold a seat in the directorate where not so busy squabbling amongst themselves, Mundvard might not have risen to such power. Profiting from Marienburg's corrupt nepotism at each step of the way.

effects.description: Request army cost: -30%
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Empire

skillTree.localised_description: Mundvard is ancient, even amongst vampires - still devotely following the teachigns of W'soran the Wicked, the Father of Vampires. Awaiting Nagash's return with everlasting patience.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to Lore of Vampires spells

skillTree.localised_description: Those who watch proceedings from behind the veil of death may reach through to aid their disciples, when required to intervene.

effects.description: Ability: "Dark Protection"

skillTree.localised_description: If magic, bloodlust and evasiveness fails - there is always the irresistible smell of gold. Humans flock around it like flies flock around a dead corpse. They turn on each other in a flash at the mere sight of silver, it's quite the sight.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.

factionEffects.localised_description: Ruling from the Shadows, Mundvard the Cruel plots and schemes his way to supreme reign over the Wasteland. Slaying, enthralling, consuming or even selling the weak men of Marienburg every step of the way.

effects.description: Stance
Stance
Establish criminal syndicates in hostile regions
Sell slaves to the highest bidder via rings of slave traffickers
Upkeep: -80% for living Marienburg units
Use lairs, burrows and tunnels to traverse the underground of the Wasteland
Slaves: 50 per turn

Leadership: +6 when fighting against Humans
	(all armies)

items.colour_text: With this ancient Artifact, souls taken by Mundvard are forced to wander and serve endlessly, prolonging his life with each taken soul. Sadistically, this artifact often disguises itself as a tool of excommunication. Mistaken by Witch Hunters and Priests of Sigmar as a instrument to root out evil, it instead latches on to it's wielder and manifests dark magic.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%
Ability: "Liberation of Souls"

items.colour_text: Hilaria om Klimt is a strong-boned but not unattractive young woman in her middle to late twenties. She is 5ft 5in tall, and has slightly wavy black hair reaching down to the middle of her back; her eyes are the tint of onyx. ''Sister Hilli'' is known by everyone who frequents Suiddock, and is well liked by the poor in Marienburg. What they don't know however, is the secret she bares. For years she is serving the dark syndicate set up to feed the Lord of Shadows his information, and what better asset Hilaria is - in the dead centre of Marienburg's middle class society, perfect for grooming potential recruits for Lord Mundvard's cause.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -15% for Marienburg units
	(all armies factionwide)

Recruit rank: +3 for Marienburg units
	(all armies factionwide)

items.colour_text: A sword that has slain generations upon generations. All who fall victim to the cursed blade of the Sword of W'soran are trapped lingering the ethereal planes for eternity. Only the wielder of mighty relic has the power to unleash the spirits of the fallen. Upon doing so, hordes of wraiths storm the mortal planes ready to do their new master's bidding.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10
Weapon strength: +10%
Ability: "Sword of W'soran"

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Cairn Wraiths

backgroundSkills.localised_description: He is Mundvard, Lord of Shadows, ruler of the underground and scourge of the Wasteland.
